        Overloaded to allow for simpler calls
        Parameters:

      • GoogleVisionUtilities

        public GoogleVisionUtilities(@NonNull
                             java.lang.String apiKey,
                             @NonNull
                             java.lang.Long timeoutInMilliseconds,
                             @NonNull
                             okhttp3.logging.HttpLoggingInterceptor.Level level)
        Constructor for the calls
        Parameters:
        apiKey - Google Vision API Key
        timeoutInMilliseconds - Timeout in milliseconds for the call. As this is dealing with images, it can be a lengthy call so I would recommend more than the usual 1 minute I use. This wil default to 2 minutes if left alone
        level - HttpLoggingInterceptor.Level This log level will print in the logcat what is happening. If null is passed, will default from the values in PGMacTipsConfig.isLiveBuild where a live build means logging and non-live means no logging.

        Parameters:
        listener - listener to send data back on
        bitmap - Image (bitmap) to be converted into a base64 and sent. Will run on async thread

        public void checkWebDetection(@NonNull

                              @NonNull

                              @Nullable
                              java.lang.Integer maxNumResults)
        Call to the Google Vision Web Detection endpoint
        Parameters:
        listener - listener to send data back on
        bitmap - Image (bitmap) to be converted into a base64 and sent. Will run on async thread
        maxNumResults - Max number of results; defaults to 1
